title: Lte disconnects, have signal, just no connection. Worse after March update
content: Pixel 3xl, seems to disconnect from LTE network all the time. Shows signal, but has an x on the meter. No calls, texts internet etc.  Only way to get it back it to reboot or put in airplane mode.  Seems to be much worse since the March upgrade.  Anyone else notice this or thoughts on how to remedy? See screenshot...
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
